snippet.title: Dashing Fire | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST Dashing Fire: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1240130/Dashing_Fire/
----------------------------------------
DASH between tiny, monster-infested planets on your journey to becoming the next Sun! Dashing Fire is a fast paced, pick up and play roguelike adventure, created entirely by a single developer: Noa Calice, with music by the awesome Dave Allen.
----------------------------------------
DISCOVER how this game was created with this DEVLOG series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBIb_auVtBwBkA0oDx3caVwC-otb4LufY

Find out more about Dave Allen: https://dave-allen-music.com/
